title: Using Open Telemetry API in your Microservices
content: OpenTelemetry is a collection of APIs, SDKs, tools you can use to instrument, generate, capture and export telemetry data. An example of telemetry data are metrics and logs which can then be analyzed to evaluate your applicationâ€™s performance and behaviour. In the era of cloud-native applications, it is pretty common to combine polyglot architectures. This ...  The post appeared first on .
